attributes.action: Offer free parking to all medical staff working at London Hospitals
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to enforce local authorities to either suspend controlled parking zones for all medical staff, or provide an alternative permit for medical staff to be able to park.
attributes.background: Due to the Coronavirus outbreak medical staff are being recruited from outside of London and due to cutbacks on public transport have limited options on travel. Therefore they need free parking to provide flexibility and to meet extended working demands.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government have announced that they will provide free car parking for all NHS and social care staff. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-provide-free-car-parking-for-nhs-and-social-care-staff

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
